Question
========

A person achieves a score of 12.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 8.4 with a standard deviation 2.3. The z-score of the person with 12.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.19
* 1.71
* 1.83

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.19: Incorrect
* 1.71: Incorrect
* 1.83: Correct
